data.quote: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem and smarter than you think.
data.author: Christopher Robin, Winnie the Pooh

data.quote: The man who has confidence in himself gains the confidence of others
data.author: Hasidic Proverb

data.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good and go for great.
data.author: Steve Prefontaine

data.quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire, not things we fear.
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it, time will pass anyway.
data.author: Earl Nightingale

data.quote: If we keep doing what we are doing, we’re going to keep getting what we’re getting.
data.author: Stephen R. Covey

data.quote: Do what you have to do until you can do what you want to do.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: The man on top of the mountain didn’t fall there.
data.author: Vince Lobardi

data.quote: Don’t be pushed by your problems, be led by your dreams.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emmerson

data.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
data.author: Tim Notke
